SemaphoreView - Class in view
 
setIcon(boolean) - Method in class view.SemaphoreView
Method that changes the image of the view(2 options:green horizontal or green vertical(if isGreenHorizontal is false))
setScenario(String) - Static method in class controller.Simulation
sets the name of the scenario this simulation is going to depict
setStation(Station) - Method in class model.MappedStation
Setter for the station
show(String) - Static method in class io.Statistics
writes the given String to console
showErr(String) - Static method in class io.Statistics
Writes the given string to console using System.err stream.
SimpleStation - Class in model
Superclass for simple stations with just one incoming and one outgoing queue
Simulation - Class in controller
Controls the flow of the simulation Singleton pattern: there can be only one simulation running at the same time
SimulationView - Class in view
Class for our main window
SimulationView() - Constructor for class view.SimulationView
Creates a JFrame main window for our simulation
size() - Method in class model.SynchronizedQueue
 
SPEEDFACTOR - Static variable in class controller.Simulation
a speed factor for the clock to vary the speed of the clock in a simple way
StartButton - Class in view
A simple JButton class for a start button
StartButton() - Constructor for class view.StartButton
 
StartStation - Class in model
Class for the beginning station, this is where all objects start
Station - Class in model
Superclass for all Stations
Station.QueueType - Enum in model
the types of queues we have INQUEUE or OUTQUEUE
StationView - Class in view
Class for the view of stations
Statistics - Class in io
A class for printing statistics
Statistics() - Constructor for class io.Statistics
 
StatisticsView - Class in view
class for displaying the statistics for the station that holds an instance of it
SynchronizedQueue - Class in model
Class for a synchronized thread safe queue
SynchronizedQueue() - Constructor for class model.SynchronizedQueue
